website_summaries.verdict: If you are searching for an infrared sauna that looks as wonderful as it will make you feel after a session, this large, efficiently designed, user-friendly model is worth a look.
pros: Sports a tempered glass door and 2 windows

customer_reviews.title: Not Bad For The Price!!
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and very easy to assemble. The bottom heaters aren't all that great but I still give this 5 stars because I absolutely love it. Same Sauna was at a local place in my city for $800 more. It has been 5 months now and it has been a really good investment. My skin is glowing, I have lost 15 pounds since March from walking on the treadmill everyday and sitting in my Sauna 3 times a week. I dont have time to go to a gym so i brought a mini gym to my home. I honestly believe a have melted thw fat away.. LOL
customer_reviews.author: ZeeTyson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my family and a I
customer_reviews.text: The crew that setup was A+ (Rico & D) the sauna feels great. The highest it’s gotten to is 150. You will sweat. Two ppl can fit in. I purchased the back seating, our backs wouldn’t burn. I’ve added a metal bowl and placed essential oils inside, so it really gives the spa vibes. The speakers/Bluetooth works out awesome. It does wonders for my inflammation! A must buy. And it seemed as if I could have put it up myself, but God didn’t bless with that talent.
customer_reviews.author: LaShanna Williams

customer_reviews.title: Helps with chronic pain!
customer_reviews.text: If you have Fibro or any chronic pain, you need to get this!! I should have gotten a 3 person to lay down in but I make this work!!! One of my best investments I have done for my health! It doesn’t take up a lot of room! Easy to assemble!
customer_reviews.author: Amzel

customer_reviews.title: ... this product for a few months now and I love it. However
customer_reviews.text: I had this product for a few months now and I love it. However, this product States it has low EMF. This is not true. I have to sit in an uncomfortable position because I can't rest my back on the walls. You have to sit about 4 to 6 in away from the panels, to avoid being impacted by the rays that they are emitting. This sauna heats well and give me a great sweat, in a short amount of time. Great after workouts and I use it regularly.
customer_reviews.author: damen Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Hard to Assemble
customer_reviews.text: In order to assemble you must be able to walk 360 degrees around the entire thing, so if you are installing it into a nook in your bathroom like me you are screwed - literally; I had to screw it together from the inside. Other than that its pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: J Fabulous

customer_reviews.title: ... excited to receive my sauna and I was not disappointed! Delivery was a breeze and earlier than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive my sauna and I was not disappointed! Delivery was a breeze and earlier than expected. Assembly took about an hour and I was ready to go. The leg heaters don't work quite as well as I would like, but the other heaters definitely make up for it. It gives a good sweat in a very comfortable environment. I love being able to listen to music and use my devices, makes the time fly by! The chromotherapy is soothing and relaxing. I've used the unit everyday. Helps with aches and pains, I get better sleep at night, my skin glows and I feel better overall. Highly recommend for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Michele M.

customer_reviews.title: Love  this thing
customer_reviews.text: First off the shipping was super fast literally pulled up to my home in 2 days I use it everyday just changes the quality of life best investment for my home gym ... looks great music clarity is cool on Bluetooth easy to put together just nice !
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: I Love my Sauna
customer_reviews.text: I managed to order this just before the COVID-19 quarantine (early March 2020) for entirely different health reasons. Boy am I grateful! I've used it daily for at least one 30 minute session (up to two sessions when I felt a bit of something wanting to make me sick). I didn't get sick- I just used the sauna 2xs daily for 5-6 days. I encourage everyone in my house to use it if they want it. :) Take that pesky illness.
customer_reviews.author: Mama3Boys

customer_reviews.title: well made
customer_reviews.text: Very well designed and goes together easily. Nice wood and great glass door with strong hinges. Takes about 30 to 40 minutes to get to 130 degrees in cool wether in an unheated garage. I am very satisfied and can rest assured that virus trying to live in my nasal passages and sinuses will die if I breathe in this hot air every day for 10 or 20 minutes. My way of fighting the COVID-19 , flu, and other colds.
customer_reviews.author: G. Getty

customer_reviews.title: Happy but wish it got hotter.
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this sauna. I’ve had it for almost a year now and use it frequently. I have warmth 4 stars instead of 5 because I can’t get the temperature above 131. I finally noticed there’s a small gap at the bottom of the glass door where I feel cool air entering. If I place a towel there the temp goes up to 140. I’d love a better solution. Some sort of gasket on the bottom on the inside?? Otherwise I’m very happy. A great value!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Hagstrom

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars in every area
customer_reviews.text: Love love love! Heats up to 130 in 15 minutes. Highest temp is 150. Blue tooth speakers are loud. I can lay down with my legs up on wall (I'm 5’4). 10 different ambient lights, towel rack, magazine rack and water holder. It's worth it. After several weeks it’s great. I was able to finish my home remodel and now it’s built into my wall and looks perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Despite the directions not being the best, assembly was pretty easy and took about 1 hour. Having 2 people made it go even faster. A lot of the steps had been preassembled so it made it even easier. The sauna experience itself is very nice. I use it with my wife and it gets hot enough to feel like any sauna I’ve used before. I also like the Bluetooth speakers and the lighting options are a nice touch as well. Very happy so far. As long as it holds up over time, it’s 5 stars for me.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Get one when you can
customer_reviews.text: This sauna is performing well beyond my expectation. Excellent communication from seller regarding delivery, arrived in two well wrapped boxes on a sturdy pallet. It is a two person build but is straight forward. Electrical components are high grade along with the wiring. It produces a lot of heat within the cabinet, control panel is easy to access from inside or outside the unit. A must buy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Burns

customer_reviews.title: 10 minutes and power off
customer_reviews.text: Work for 20 minutes or so. And shut it off . Who can cotact me for replace parts?
customer_reviews.author: Y. Liu

customer_reviews.title: So easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to go together, had a few panels below bench that did not work at first. Called help line and they were very knowledgeable about product and had me up to full operation in no time. I did add a weather strip around door to allow temp to rise in sauna.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Peterman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. Quite fast shipping. Works great. I’ve been to plenty of spas and this unit really works well. I asked the seller questions because a reviewer posted that he could not get ahold of them. They responded within 30 minutes. No issue with that at all. It is very much worth the price, which for what this is- in not much!
customer_reviews.author: Akamaru

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: And this item is wonderful. I had a little bit of damage on one of the panels when it arrived but the company immediately took care of it quickly. I had the replacement part in a few days. I had my grandson put it together in no time at allAnd it works well. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Richard I Shudak

customer_reviews.title: Well designed sauna
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband for our anniversary. He loves it and uses it almost daily. The temperature and time controls are an excellent feature. It comes extremely well and tightly packaged. Extra help is needed to move the sections and set it up, which slide and clip together.
customer_reviews.author: ImeldaM

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my friends and they love it. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Herby Fevilien

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, fair value
customer_reviews.text: What I wanted, what I needed, good value. Having to set up a dedicated line was not ideal but it keeps it safe.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Once you have one you’ll never go without!
customer_reviews.text: Great value and easy assembly. Surprisingly inexpensive compared to the health benefits. Won’t ever go without one.
customer_reviews.author: Fred3

customer_reviews.title: happy to have
customer_reviews.text: great product, good quality and easy assembly. so inexpensive considering the benefits of having one of these.
customer_reviews.author: George Kawamoto

customer_reviews.title: Its was everything as advertisted
customer_reviews.text: Home use, the preheating takes a moment other wise completely satisfied .
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. My only complaint is about the lower leg heater. I wish they could generate more heat.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Carrasquillo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I love my sauna!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this sauna! I use it daily and am so happy with my purchase. The size is great perfect for one person and will accommodate 2 people comfortably. It plugs into my existing outlets and is a great size for the room it is in. I love the adjustable lighting and the windows. I have noticed less body aches and pains and my skin is looking great too. I highly recommend this sauna! I did purchase a bench cushion and a back rest which makes it more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Deutscher

customer_reviews.title: No Warranty nor Support
customer_reviews.text: The warranty and support section directs to a pdf with a different name brand (lifeSMART), two inactive phone numbers, an inactive email address and a dead weblink. After an hour on the phone with Amazon customer service, it was determined there is no support for this product
customer_reviews.author: Blake P calloway

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sauna and quality/caring customer service!
customer_reviews.text: I took the attached photo about 45 minutes after the sauna arrived. I am somewhat handy with building but you definitely do not need to be to assemble this sauna. So much easier than expected. Unfortunately a plug in the ceiling came loose while I installed it. I reached out to the seller Tony, he had me in touch with the company that assembled the sauna and within minutes it was fixed and working great! I really enjoy my daily sauna!
customer_reviews.author: Harry A. Derr III

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sauna. Quality is perfect and worth the price! Easy easy to assemble. Would highly recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: SB

customer_reviews.title: Fast easy enjoyable
customer_reviews.text: The sauna arrived very quickly. I received a call from the supplier after the order. He was courteous and reassuring. The sauna assembled easily. Two people, I and my wife, were needed for the first 3 sides. I easily completed the assembly on my own. It is intimate for 2, comfortable for 1. I am enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Great sauna super warm great sweat
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this sauna. It didn’t break the bank cost wise and I’ve used it nearly everyday for the past month now. Easy to assemble and fantastic value! I am beyond pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Lin M.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy it was to assemble. Definitely want a second person, but only takes 15-20 minutes to assemble. Mine consistently gets up to 140 degrees F within 35-45 minutes. Happy with my purchase. Wood is sturdy. No rocking when getting in.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase, Easy Assembly
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to put together and shipment came so fast too. Thank You!!!
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Carter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sauna
customer_reviews.text: East to put together and gives great heat. Completely exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Dynamic "Andora" 2-person Low EMF Far Infrared Sauna
product_meta.description: Dynamic Low EMF Saunas are constructed with the environment in mind which accounts for our efforts in using Reforested Canadian Hemlock wood. Our sauna walls are double paneled constructed with the thickest interior and exterior wood planks compared to others in the same industry. This all translates to a quality sauna that retains heat more efficiently, heats up faster and wastes less energy. Dynamic 2 Person model offers 6 Low EMF infrared Carbon Energy Efficient heating panels (including an industry leading foot heater) that produce a wider, softer heat that is evenly distributed throughout the sauna. Our Low EMF infrared Carbon Energy Efficient heating panel heaters are 30% larger than saunas heated by ceramic tubes and penetrate skin 40% more to maximize therapeutic benefits. Unlike ceramic heaters, you will never have to replace our Carbon Energy Efficient heating panels. Unlike traditional rock and water saunas (which heat at or over 200F and do not penetrate your skin), Dynamic Saunas operate at a much lower and safer 130F. In fact, Dynamic Saunas operate most effectively at 120F thus allowing you to enjoy the sauna longer and maximize all potential health benefits. Dynamic 2 person sauna is designed for ease of use and is an outstanding value. Assembly is a snap and takes less than 1 hour. Enjoy the convenience of operating a Dynamic Sauna with our dual (int. and ext.) soft touch control panel and LED display featuring sauna temperature and time functions. Play your favorite music through the saunas built in MP3 aux connection with speakers. The sauna plugs into any dedicated 15 amp 110 volt outlet so no special wiring is required and the sauna may be installed on carpet and at any indoor location including the basement, garage, master bath or walk in closet. Our sauna would be a beautiful and worthwhile addition to any fitness room. See and feel the difference today!
feature_bullets: This item will be delivered curbside. To have the item delivered to a location of choice on your property, kindly make additional arrangements with a third party provider ahead of delivery
6 Dynamic Low EMF FAR Infrared Carbon heating panels 2 on the rear wall 1 on each side wall 1 under the bench and 1 on the floor board
Natural Reforested Canadian Hemlock wood construction
6mm Interior and Exterior wood planks with a 1.13 inch inner frame
Clear Tempered glass door and with side windows

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars57 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
